summary: Build a fully supported version of the “Quick Bee Agency” AI-powered agency SaaS dashboard with dark teal/black futuristic UI, role-based access (Admin/Manager/Client), service marketplace and checkout (Stripe only), CRM/leads/projects/analytics/automation, and non-AI rule-based generators within platform constraints (no email, no external AI APIs).
architectural_notes: Platform constraints for this build: Stripe-only payments (test mode supported); no Razorpay/UPI.
No external AI APIs (e.g., OpenAI/Anthropic); replace “AI modules” with rule-based/on-platform generators.
Email features disabled; implement notifications as in-app only and avoid email sequences/alerts.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Set of 9 gradient 3D-style sidebar icons with teal-to-cyan gradient, soft lighting, depth, subtle neon glow, realistic shadow (quickbee-icons-sidebar.dim_1024x1024.png)
- Collection of 6 feature/module 3D icons in the same style for Generators, Automation, Analytics, Payments, CRM, Leads (quickbee-icons-modules.dim_1024x1024.png)
- Abstract dark background with subtle animated-looking teal gradient mesh and floating blurred shapes (static image) (quickbee-bg-mesh.dim_1920x1080.png)

existing_features.title: Implement the premium modern dark UI design system for “Quick Bee Agency” using deep black (#0F0F0F) backgrounds, teal green (#00C2A8) accent color, and smooth teal-to-emerald gradients (#00C2A8 → #00E0B8 → #009688) across buttons, highlights, hover states, and interactive elements; use modern bold sans-serif typography (Inter/Poppins style), rounded 2xl cards, glassmorphism panels (subtle transparency + light blur), thin teal borders, hover-scale animation, and ~300ms transitions; ensure the layout is clean, minimal, fast-loading, and mobile responsive.

Create the core dashboard layout and navigation structure: a left sidebar navigation with items (Dashboard, Leads, Services, CRM, Automation, Analytics, Payments, Legal, Settings), and a top navbar with a notification bell (glow indicator) and a profile dropdown; include KPI dashboard cards, neon teal progress bars, dark input fields with teal focus rings, gradient primary buttons with hover glow, pricing cards with soft glow borders, AI/generator feature cards, and a subtle animated teal gradient mesh/floating blurred shapes background.

Add gradient 3D-style iconography across navigation and feature cards: provide a consistent set of teal-to-cyan gradient icons with soft lighting, subtle glow, depth, and realistic shadow effects; use these icons for sidebar items and module cards.

Implement role-based login with a role selection UI (Admin, Manager, Client) and fixed demo credentials for each role; maintain an authenticated session in the frontend and enforce strict role-based access restrictions across navigation and page-level actions.

Create the service marketplace with 30 productized services (exact names as provided), each offering Indian student-friendly pricing tiers (Basic, Pro, Premium) within the specified INR ranges; implement service detail view, plan selection, a comparison table, and add-to-cart functionality.

Implement secure checkout using Stripe only (test mode supported) with INR pricing; after a successful payment, automatically create a Project under the Client’s dashboard and record an Order/Payment entry that is visible in Payments/Invoices views.

Implement Projects and Client Onboarding: create a client onboarding form (Business Name, Niche, Goals, Budget, Timeline) and auto-link onboarding details to the client’s project(s); ensure Client can track project status and view deliverables placeholders.

Build the Lead Management system capable of handling up to 3000 leads with channel fields (Email, LinkedIn, Instagram, WhatsApp, SMS), micro-niche filtering (50 ultra-specific micro-niches), structured “scraping-ready” fields (without implementing scraping), and CSV export.

Implement the CRM dashboard with pipeline stages (New Lead, Contacted, Qualified, Proposal Sent, Closed, Lost) including task assignment, follow-up reminders (in-app only), notes, and activity tracking; integrate CRM items with Leads and Projects where appropriate.

Create Analytics dashboards showing glowing gradient charts for revenue, active clients, conversion rate, top-selling services, and lead source performance, using available on-canister data (orders, leads, projects) and/or seeded demo data when empty.

Implement an Automation Center using rule-based (non-AI) logic with module cards for: Auto WhatsApp replies, sequence builder (non-email), proposal auto-send after qualification, payment confirmation automation, and project onboarding auto-trigger; provide toggles and simple rule configuration per automation, and record automation events/logs.

Replace all disallowed AI modules with fully supported, non-AI “Generators” that use deterministic templates/rules (no external API calls) for: service recommendations, proposals, pricing strategy, closing scripts, follow-up messages (Email/WhatsApp/LinkedIn/SMS as text templates only), and lead qualification scoring; allow downloading the generated proposal as a file (PDF if feasible within the platform, otherwise a downloadable HTML/text document).

Implement Legal Essentials section with editable templates for Privacy Policy, Terms & Conditions, Refund Policy, Service Agreement, GST Invoice Support, and Disclaimer; only Admin can edit, while others can view as allowed.

Implement Offer management with toggles for Festival Offer, Student Discount, Limited-Time Deal, and a coupon code system; apply offers/coupons during checkout/cart calculations and reflect discounts in orders.

Create an in-app notification system with a notification center UI and glow unread indicator; generate notifications for key events such as payment success, proposal/generator creation, CRM reminders, and project updates; do not implement email notifications.

Define and implement the backend data model and APIs (single Motoko actor) to support: Users/Roles, Services/Packages, Cart/Orders/Payments, Projects/Onboarding, Leads, CRM Activities/Tasks, Offers/Coupons, Legal Pages, Notifications, and Generator logs; include basic admin management screens for viewing key records and safe seed/demo data for initial app usability.

new_feature_requests.summary: Implement premium dark SaaS UI (deep black + teal/emerald gradients), sidebar/nav layout, KPI cards/charts, glassmorphism panels, 3D-style gradient icons, responsive design, smooth transitions/hover effects
Role-based login system with fixed demo credentials (Admin/Manager/Client) and strict access control across modules
Service marketplace with 30 productized services and Indian pricing tiers (Basic/Pro/Premium), comparison table and add-to-cart
Payments + checkout using Stripe (test mode) and post-payment workflow to auto-create a client project and show invoices/orders
Lead management system (up to 3000 leads) with micro-niche filtering, structured DB format, and CSV export
CRM dashboard with pipeline stages, task assignment, follow-up reminders (non-email), notes and activity tracking
Analytics dashboard with revenue, active clients, conversion rate, top-selling services, and lead source performance charts
Automation center with rule-based (non-AI) automations: WhatsApp replies, sequence builder (non-email), proposal auto-send logic, payment confirmation automation, project onboarding triggers
Client onboarding form (business name, niche, goals, budget, timeline) auto-linked to project system
Legal essentials section with editable templates (Privacy Policy, Terms, Refund, Service Agreement, GST invoice support, Disclaimer) editable by Admin
Offer system with toggles (Festival Offer, Student Discount, Limited-Time Deal) and coupon codes
Notification system: in-app notification center (no email) for payment/proposal/updates
Define scalable SaaS-ready database structure for Users/Roles/Services/Packages/Orders/Projects/Leads/CRM Activities/Payments/Offers/Legal Pages/AI(or rule-gen) logs
